snippet: When asked about their positions on a proposed waste transfer station on the Upper East Side, Mr. de Blasio and Mr. Lhota offered different responses.
abstract: When asked about their positions on a proposed waste transfer station on the Upper East Side, Mr. de Blasio and Mr. Lhota offered different responses.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
